helping_mothers: Aiutiamo le mamme refugiate ad avere accesso a tutto l'aiuto di cui hanno bisogno
about_blurb: Dove le donne incinta e le mamme rifugiate possono ottenere tutto il necessario per i loro figli e per la loro gravidanza.
name: Il tuo nome
interests_placeholder: What languages do you speak? Do you have any hobbies?
children_bio_placeholder: How many children do you have? What are their names?
request_and_email_sentence_profile: Please find your requests below. An email will be sent to you when the request has been accepted
donor_request_page_intro:
Here you can see all the current requests that are being made by mothers across the country.
 You can filter the requests by your city or by which ones are active with the buttons below.
 Or just click on 'view all requests' to see what items are really needed right now.
 Thank you for all your hard work and help!
These items were requested by you: These items were requested by you:
has offered to donate these items: has offered to donate these items
refugee_mother_call_to_action_title: ¿Eres una madre que necesita nuestra ayuda?
refugee_mother_call_to_action: En Sonder estamos aquí para disminuir las dificultades del realojamiento de las madres refugiadas y sus hijos. Regístrese a continuación para solicitar los recursos que usted y su hijo necesitan.
donor_call_to_action: Son nuestros voluntarios que hacen posible el posible el trabajo de Sonder. Solicitamos panales, juguetes de nino y libros. Registrese y ayude a realizar el cambio.
donor_request_title: Hello, here are all requests that are waiting to be fullfilled
donor_fulfillment: Thank you! This request is being fulfilled
about_blurb_2:
On Sonder, refugee mothers can log into their personal area, and submit a request of help by picking items from different categories.

The request is then available on the platform.

Donors and volunteers can honour a request, and by doing so the mother in need is notified via email.

The website is fully translated in seven languages, including Ukrainian, to make it as accessible as possible. It also uses icons and images where possible, for the same reason.

Sonder s code lives on GitHub.
